name: ckb-js-toolkit-contrib
description: Utilities built on top of ckb-js-toolkit

scripts.update-schema-file: curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nervosnetwork/ckb/27c36a55e6358fd04153ec3da4638b6e10660da6/util/types/schemas/blockchain.mol -o blockchain.mol && moleculec --language - --schema-file blockchain.mol --format json > blockchain.json && moleculec-es -inputFile blockchain.json -outputFile src/blockchain.js && rm blockchain.mol blockchain.json

author: Xuejie Xiao
